original_title: Iron Maiden The Men Behind The Mask
overview: Are Iron Maiden the most successful Heavy Metal band of all time? 80 million albums would certainly tilt towards a yes, but here we get the full story behind a music machine that has not always run smoothly. Maiden members Paul Diâ€Anno and Dennis Stratton give the inside scoop on the carnage wreaked behind the scenes, and one time keyboardist for the boys and now leading club promoter Tony Moore talks about his time in the band and the bigger scene surrounding it.
title: Iron Maiden The Men Behind The Mask
